name: Toyota Glanza
description: The price of Toyota Glanza, a 5 seater Hatchback, ranges from Rs. 6.86  - 10.00 Lakh. It is available in 9 variants, with an engine of 1197 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Glanza comes with 6 airbags. Toyota Glanza is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 22.3 to 30.61 kmpl for Glanza.
